rooms.Name: Arthur's Pad of Pondering
rooms.Description:
Arthur's chosen room of relaxtion. Books sit on the floor. Spread around
the room. For whenever Arthur choses to read them. Arthur's 486 sits on the
floor. Next to some cds that have been left here. Among them a couple Beatles
cds and a Hendrix cd. Computer game boxes sit next to Arthur's 'Puter. Next
to his cases of disks. A small fridge sits on the floor here. Its open.
Revealing its contents. Several Mountain Dews and some snacks.

rooms.Name: Before the Heart of Gold Starship
rooms.Description:
As you walk up the path, you come upon a ship. As you look around at
it you notice how much it seems to be shaped like a shoe. A sleek, 
white running shoe. The ship looks rather large but not very tall. It
seems to be almost perfectly white, like its brand new and has never at
all been flown before. But then you think to yourself 'How did it get 
here?'.

rooms.Name: Below the Starship
rooms.Description:
As you stand on the Heart of Golds entrance ramp your eyes begin to
wander around. Above you the inside of the starship is visible, however,
you will have to climb up to see more. To the south, behind you, the 
small ramp ends.

rooms.Name: Entrance Hall
rooms.Description:
This is the entrance hall and first room of the Starship. Now, that 
you stand in it, you can see it better. The room, much like the
whole hallway your eye can see, is perfectly white and like the outside
of the ship looks very new.

rooms.Name: East Of The Entrance Hall
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the room directly east of the entrance hall. This
room like looks like all the others youve seen in the ship. To the 
north you can see a short hall. The hallway here runs east and west.

rooms.Name: A East-West Hallway
rooms.Description:
This is a normal, perfectly white, hallway that runs through the starship
in a east and west direction. To the east you think you can see a door 
that looks very large and very tall.

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description:
This is another hallway. This one runs north and south. To the 
east you can see a door. The hallway runs west as well as south.

rooms.Name: A Empty Room
rooms.Description:
As you enter this room, the door quirks 'Have a nice day'. Looking around,
you can tell that whoevers room this is has not been here long. For there
are no real items in this room. Only the bed and the small window. Looking
outside the window, you see the stars and what must have once been earth..

rooms.Name: A East-West Hallway
rooms.Description:
This is a normal, perfectly white hallways that runs thru the
ship in a east-west direction. On down the hallway a bit to the 
east a door is visible.

rooms.Name: The Eastern End Of The Hallway
rooms.Description:
This is the eastern of the hallway. A large door that looks 
like it could be made out of steel looms to the east of you. You
wonder what could be behind a door that looks so large...

rooms.Name: The Engine Room
rooms.Description:
The improbabilty drive, being the remarkable device its designers
claim it to be, requires a whole room to itself. However, anyone
who knows the galatic goverments policy on how they pay thier 
designers doesnt buy that. For you see, they pay them by the room.
When asked about this, the designers smirked and looked down at
thier shoes. (The goverment also gives great shoes as birthday gifts)

rooms.Name: Center Room
rooms.Description:
This is the center room of the ship. To the east and west you notice two
doors. The door to the west looks closed while the door to the east looks
ajar. A long hallway leads to the north. It runs all the way north to what
looks like the bridge.

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description:
This is the corner room of the Hallway. To the south is a hallway 
and to the east is the center room. A door is to the west. Above
you, a hatch is visible.

rooms.Name: Standing in the Smoke
rooms.Description:
You have entered a small door. Smoke billows from another door to the
south of you. More like a large hole then a door. But a entry none the 
less. Through the smoke,standing in front of the door, stands a man.
His tall figure looming ahead of you. Patches of black through 
the white. Moving forward, your feet get lost. You trip forward onto the
shoes of a figure. Above you,a mask slowly leans his head towards you. A
pale,deep voice calling through the nothingness. 'Stand'. Something in
you MAKES you obey it. Quite a moving voice.

rooms.Name: West Of The Entrance Hall
rooms.Description:
This is the room directly west of the entrance to this starship. A 
small hallway runs through the starship here in a east-west 
direction. To the east you think you can see a door down the hall a
bit.

rooms.Name: A East-West Hallway
rooms.Description:
This is a normal, perfectly white, hallway that runs through the
ship in a east-west direction. To the west, a large door looms
above you.

rooms.Name: A East-West Hallway
rooms.Description:
This is a normal perfectly white hallway that runs through the
ship in a east-west direction. To the west a door is clearly
visible. The hallway runs on down the hall to the east.

rooms.Name: Before The Improbabilty Room
rooms.Description:
You now stand before the door of the improbabilty room. A room
thats so improbale, you dont know whats inside. Its a large 
door that calls for your you to open it. In the other direction,
to the east, the hallway runs as far as your eye can see.

rooms.Name: The Improbabilty Room
rooms.Description:
As you look around you dont believe your eyes. A infinite number of
monkeys are trying to convince a infinite number of monkeys that 
writing Hamlet is stupid becuase it was so boring to begin with and
will only bring homework and stupid projects to kids in school.

rooms.Name: A Empty Room
rooms.Description:
As you enter this room you notice how colorful it is. It seems to
almost emulate a peppy nature with its flowers and British music 
posters that are all around. Indeed, the room seems to smell a lot
like the flowers. As you peer around, behind the flowers, you notice
a cage that must have once contained mice..

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of a long hallway. The hallway runs
north and south. You cant quite make out whats to the north but it
looks like the front of this starship.

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of a hallway. To the west you can see 
a door. You assume it must be someones room but from here you cant
quite tell who it belongs to. From here, to the north, you can see the
bridge. A small hatch below your feet catches your eye.

rooms.Name: A Empty Room
rooms.Description:
As you enter this room, you notice how boring it is to the eye. The walls
are white and the only thing that catches your eye is the window that looks
out into space. A bed lies here empty, much like the rest of this room and
indeed the ship in general.

rooms.Name: On The Ladder
rooms.Description:
You are near the top of a ladder that leads into the darkness
below you. The rungs under your hands are wet and you have to
be careful you dont fall. You cant see the floor...

rooms.Name: On The Ladder
rooms.Description:
As you lower yourself on the ladder your hands almost slip off
and you barely avoid falling into the void below you. The rungs
are almost too wet to go on but you are not sure you can climb
up either...

rooms.Name: On The Ladder
rooms.Description:
Biting your tongue you have chosen to climb down. From here
you cant see below you and you cant see above you. However,
you can see that the ladder ends about 2 feet below you...

rooms.Name: Off The Ladder
rooms.Description:
As you climb down the last rungs of the ladder and step off 
you feel the water under your shoes. As you stand here several 
drops of water hit your head and you look up to see where 
they come from. Its way too dark here to tell however.

rooms.Name: A Dark Hallway
rooms.Description:
As you walk along the hallway you notice a light. The light
seems to come from just ahead of you. You think you hear
someone muttering something about having a brain the size
of a planet..

rooms.Name: The Coldest And Darkest Room In The Starship
rooms.Description:
As you enter the room you notice how cold it it. You also
notice how wet it is.You dont understand this room until you 
see a robot sitting in the corner, with his back to you.
You slap yourself for not realizing that this is..MARVINS
ROOM! Marvin mutters to himself some more..Not caring that
you have come into his room.

rooms.Name: The Bridge Of The Heart Of The Gold Starship
rooms.Description:
Ahh here you are. Standing on the bridge on the Heart Of Gold starship,
you feel proud. The room fills the entire front of the ship you assume,
as its all around you in every direction. A large viewscreen in front
of you pumps in from a external camera..or it might just be a window.
In front of you there is a control panel for doing various functions.

rooms.Name: Control Area Of The Heart Of Gold
rooms.Description:
As you step forward onto the control area from the bridge you notice
the panel before you. Its adorned with all kinds of blinking lights
and flashing buttons. You wonder who the captain could be until you see
a man sitting with his feet up, leaning back. Hes a very odd looking 
man who seems to have two-heads. Every few seconds he sits up, leans
forward, and pushes a few buttons. As he notices you he says 'Its very
easy to fly..just never press any buttons that are red'.

rooms.Name: West Of The Bridge
rooms.Description:
You are standing directly west of the bridge. Just ahead of 
you, you can make out a control panel and a man relaxing with
his feet up...But you cant see a entrance to the area..You
can faintly hear some hummings,whirrings, and buzzings from
the west..

rooms.Name: The Western Corner Of The Bridge
rooms.Description:
This is the western corner of the bridge. As you look around
you notice a small computer sitting on the floor. It keeps 
muttering something about wanting to be your friend. You 
realize this piece of machinery to be the happy and joyful
onboard ship computer, Eddie..

rooms.Name: Outside the Airlock
rooms.Description:
You stand in the middle of space. The stars around you glisten and shine.
As you turn around you can see a starship in the distance behind you. It 
looks perfectly white and is quite a sight against the blackness of space
that surrounds it in all directions. A airlock is open in the side of it.

rooms.Name: Before a Large Book
rooms.Description:
You have come upon a large book in the middle of a path. Two words
fill its cover. It reaches high above the tree and as such you cover
your eyes to the sun above it. You find it very odd that a large 
book would be in the middle of the path. Of course you have no idea
what book it is. Perhaps if you had some idea what book it was it might
make a little sense. One thing you have learned is not to open giant
books in the middle of paths. Its a rule that your dear mother taught you.
You always liked your mother. That is till she was killed in the Great
collapsing Hrung disaster. Since noone survived, noone is quite sure what
a Hrung is. Or why it should decide to collapse on your mother. You start 
to panic. The words on the books cover seem to calm you however.

Exits.Description: A large book that towers high above your head.

rooms.Name: Inside the Book
rooms.Description:
This is a small hallway inside the interior of the large book you found
on the path. To the east is a odd-looking airlock. To the west is what looks
like a small path. The hallway continues to your north.

rooms.Name: Above a Dolphin Tank
rooms.Description:
You currently stand above a dolphin tank. Upon a large platform that 
extends over the middle of that is. Below you in the murky blue water
swim two dolphins. Swimming in circles as they prepare for a very
complex move. A move quite like what dolphins do. Misunderstood by
humans. But of course this is obvious. Consindering that dolphins
are the second smartest form on life on the planet. While Humans are
in a distant third. Above you hangs a small hoop. Swinging in midair.
Ahead of you in the stands are people. All anxious to see to what they
do. You on the other hand are not quite sure what you are doing above a 
dolphin tank to begin with. You boggle at the concept.

rooms.Name: The Airlock of a Ship
rooms.Description:
The airlock of the Vogon ship. Its very dark and cramped here as you
expected it might be. Being hospitable is not something the Vogons 
are known for. The Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy has a few words on 
Vogons. It mentions that as they crawled out of the slime of thier
planet it was just as evoultion had given up on them. You see this as
you look at a guard sitting here. Hes rather ugly and his body fat
and bloated. As he sees you he stands up and stomps around. Seeing
that your reaction is null he gives up and sits down. He gives out
a large sigh as he slumps against the wall.

Exits.Description: A big yellow door sits here before you.

rooms.Name: A East-West Hallway
rooms.Description:
This is a east-west hallway that runs through the ship. To the west you
can see a big yellow door that matches the color of the ship. There appears
to be a small window in the door that looks into the next room. The end 
of the hallway to the east is visible from here.

Exits.Description: A big yellow door sits before you.

rooms.Name: A East-West Hallway
rooms.Description:
This is a hallway that runs through the ship in a east-west direction.
Its dark,yellow, and smells VERY bad but other then that it is quite
plesant to be standing in. You can see a door to the west and what looks
like the end of the hallway to the east.

rooms.Name: The Center of a North-South Hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of a hallway that appears to run in 
a north-south direction. The lighting is good enough for you see
that it runs quite a ways in both directions.

rooms.Name: A North-South Hallway
rooms.Description:
As you continue to walk along the hallway you look around. To the south
a few doors are visible in different directions.

rooms.Name: Before Some Rooms
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of a hallway. Two doors that face each other 
are to the east and west of you. The hallway that you stand in continues 
to the north and to the south.

rooms.Name: A North-South Hallway
rooms.Description:
You currently stand near the end of the hallway. You can see that it clearly
ends just to the south of you. A couple of doors are visible north of you.

rooms.Name: End of the Hallway
rooms.Description:
As you continue to walk along you come to the end of the hallway and you
realize you should turn around about now and walk in the other direction.
The wall that sits before you is black and drips water in several places.

rooms.Name: A North-South Hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing just north of the center of the hallway. The hallway that
you are in continues to the north and south. Another hallway is visible to
the southeast.

rooms.Name: A North-South Hallway
rooms.Description:
This is the part of the hallway that is quite a bit north of the hallway
that you came out of. It is not quite visible from here. The end of the 
hallway is visble to the north of where you stand.

rooms.Name: End of the Hallway
rooms.Description:
This is the end of the long north-south hallway. From here you can barely
make out the end of the hallway far to the south of you. The hallway runs
to the east.

rooms.Name: Before a Huge Locked Door
rooms.Description:
As you walk in this room you notice a door. It appears huge and looms
above you to the north. It looks very tough and sturdy and quite a few
strange symbols adorne it. They are arranged in rows and run the length
of the door in several directions. The hallway continues to the east.

rooms.Name: A East-West Hallway
rooms.Description:
As you continue walking along the hallway the lighting seems to get better.
You can now see clearly see the end of the hallway to the east but the
door that you came out of is no longer visible. The smell is also worse
here then it was before.

rooms.Name: A Empty Room
rooms.Description:
As you enter this room you notice a horrid smell. You assume it's coming
from the large,fat,green creature that's sitting in the corner. He looks
a tad bit taller then you and loads fatter. He removes a blaster from his
side and draws a bead on your skull.

rooms.Name: A Empty Room
rooms.Description:
The first thing that you see when you walk into this room is a creature.
Not any creature, mind you, but a green creature. He appears to be rather
tall and wielding some kind of high powered weapon. You notice he has some
armor draped across his chest,legs,and his arms.

rooms.Name: A Small Closet
rooms.Description:
You start to poke to around in the dark only to hear something moving
and feel something unseen poke you back...

rooms.Name: Before a Green Door
rooms.Description:
You have opened the large door and come upon another door. This one
appears to be green. A large skull adornes the door. Directly in the
center of the large door. Unlike the door, the skull is not green.
No the skull is blood red. Rubbing your fingers along the door you
come to the conclusion of what the red is not. Its not paint...*Gulp*

rooms.Name: Down a Ladder, Into a room
rooms.Description:
You climb down the ladder and look around. You are standing in a small 
hallway that appears to run north and south. You see a small door to the 
north. Two doors are to the east and west of your present location.

rooms.Name: A Large Office
rooms.Description:
A large desk sits here. Behind the desk you can see a HUGE chair that
only a very large creature would need. The desk is not wood but appears
to be made out of some kind of metal. The only thing on top of the desk
is a bowl of some vile looking soup. There is a rather large window
in the back of the room. Behind the desk. As you look out into space,
you catch sight of a long white ship. Hmmm..

rooms.Name: A Kitchen
rooms.Description:
The first thing you notice here is the pots. Quite a few pots are laying
around here. It appears that someone has thrown them around without care.
You stop and pick some off the floor. A sticky green substance is visible
inside it. This room is rather large and many cabinets adorne the walls.
Its dark here. The Stench is UNBEARABLE here and you assume its from the
different types of Vogon food(food?) around. Quite a few bugs clamor in the
food left on the floor. Perhaps getting a snack.

rooms.Name: A Small Room
rooms.Description:
This is a small room. It appears bare. The only thing you can see is
some boxes that are labeled 'Food'.  Water drips from three places in
the celing. One happens to be above your head. You step back. Its 
rather lighted here and you are surprised.

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description:
You continue walking down the hall to the south. It continues to 
the south and the north.

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description:
You walk along the long hallway south some more. The end of the hallway is
visible to the south. A door can be seen to the north.

rooms.Name: End of the Hallway
rooms.Description: You have reached the end of the hallway. To the north a door can be seen.

rooms.Name: Hallway
rooms.Description:
This is a long hallway that runs in a east and west direction from where
you stand. You can go east and west.

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description: This is a long hallway that runs east and west of where you stand. You can continue walking east or go back west.

rooms.Name: A Small Room
rooms.Description:
This is a small vent that continues up. It also continues down. The vent
here is about 5 feet wide and looks very high. Light is visible however.

rooms.Name: Inside a Dolphin Tank
rooms.Description:
A dolphin tank. Murky water all around you as you swim with the creatures.
Blurred images follow you. Swimming in circles near you. Above you a round
circle of light. Your watery friends leaping towards the circle. Above the
circle and through the circle. Crashing back through it in a splash. And
as you continue to swim you start to realize a few things. 1) Dolphins are
quite smart. 2) They are quite great creatures and 3) You are choking.

rooms.Name: A Small Hallway
rooms.Description:
You currently stand in the middle of a hallway. A hallway that runs 
north and south of where you stand. It appears to go on for quite 
some distance to the south.

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the middle of a north-south hallway. You can continue
walking south or go back north.

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description:
You continue walking to the south. Down a long north-south hallway. 
To the south the end of the hallway is visible.

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a north-south hallway. To the south you can just make
out the end of it. You can continue south or go back north.

rooms.Name: End of the Hallway
rooms.Description:
You seem to reached the end of the hallway. The hallway that ran north and 
south. To the west is a small room. While to the east is another, rather 
short hallway.

rooms.Name: The Crew's Bunks
rooms.Description:
You have come upon a rather dark room. The bunks of the entire vogon 
crew. Except that of the Captain. Who noone wanted to bunk with. Upon
the far wall are quite a few bunks. They appear to be stacked upon the 
wall. Even more bunks are stacked upon the other two walls. Upon the 
floor are some spare clothes. Or what you assume to be clothes. Getting
close to them causes a nasty earache,a bloodly nose and your clothes
to shrink 2 sizes. You back away. Upon one of the bunks sits a small radio.
The news announcer comes on. 'And the big news tonight is the news that 
Zaphod Beeblebrox has stolen the heart the gold starship. And the 
question everyones asking. Has the big z flipped?'

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description:
You start walking down the short east-west hallway. To the east and west
you can see both ends of the hallway. To the east there appears to be
some sort of a door.

rooms.Name: Before a Door
rooms.Description:
You have reached the end of the hallway. To the direct east of you
is a door. While to the south is another yet another room.

rooms.Name: The Captains Quarters
rooms.Description:
Oh no..This appears to be the room of Prostentic Vogon Jeltz. And he
does not look happy that you have disturbed him. He hears that you
have entered and wakes up. Rising from his small cot against the wall he 
stands and points at you. You sutter 'Umm..yea..umm..well..err..'. He 
sighs loudly and goes back to sleep. Snoring loudly within seconds. 
Against the wall you can see a small tv. It appears to be some sort of
a tv that is. Nothing you have ever seen.

rooms.Name: A Dining Hall
rooms.Description:
You have reached the area where the Vogons enjoy thier meals. Well, 
its not much of a hall. No, its not a hall....You search for the words..
Ahh...Well...Its a meat locker. Several corpses of odd and very 
different things hang on the wall. While some lay half-eaten on the 
floor.

rooms.Name: Joebob's Domain of Pleasure
rooms.Description:
This room is very disturbing to you. All five senses. Perhaps more.
Some posters line the walls. Depicting various odd devices. The 
entire room is painted blood red. In the middle of this room is a 
very odd-looking man. He appears to be stiring some sort of pot. A 
odd smell arouses you from the pot. You black out. After coming to, 
you notice something. The odd-looking man appears to be grining.
A wide smile crossing his face. A very sinister smile.

rooms.Name: Large Cavern
rooms.Description:
A large cavern is worn into the rock here. Your light plays tricks on the 
walls here.  You see movement out of the corner of your eye.

rooms.Name: Lost in the Swirling Sands of a Odd Planet
rooms.Description:
You are lost. Lost in the wilderness. A stranger in a even stranger 
land. All around the cold winds nip at you.

rooms.Name: Lost in the Swirling Sands of a Odd Planet
rooms.Description:
You stumble along the wilderness. Reaching through the sands. 
Crawling along. Finding what you can find as you continue along.

rooms.Name: Lost in the Swirling Sands of a Odd Planet
rooms.Description:
All around you the cold winds sear at your face. The dust and sand
blowing in your face. You continue on walking. Searching for signs
of life.

rooms.Name: Lost in the Swirling Sands of a Odd Planet
rooms.Description:
You are lost in a land you do not know. A land very different from any
that you have ever known. Indeed, it scares you even. Having no idea
where to go or what to do. You trudge on through the sand. Fighting
the cold winds as you walk against them.

rooms.Name: Lost in the Swirling Sands of a Odd Planet
rooms.Description:
You are lost in the sands of a odd planet. You trudge along through
the dust and wind. Above you the sun boars down on your back.

rooms.Name: Lost in the Swirling Sands of a Odd Planet
rooms.Description:
Your tired legs continue to carry you. Carrying you across a wide Desert.
Towards the horizon and what you might find there.

rooms.Name: Lost in the Swirling Sands of a Odd Planet
rooms.Description:
You continue your voyage through a strange land. Walking towards
a distant point. Anywhere decent to rest.

rooms.Name: Lost in the Swirling Sands of a Odd Planet
rooms.Description:
Having long been lost, you are about ready to collapse. The vultures
flying overhead will feed on you. Eating what remains of you. You had
better find something quick...Or be thier food.

rooms.Name: Lost in the Swirling Sands of a Odd Planet
rooms.Description:
You have found what looks like shelter. A small hut. Among all the 
sand. A haven to rest in. You hope the residents are nice..

rooms.Name: Lost in the Swirling Sands of a Odd Planet
rooms.Description:
You continue towards the horizon. Walking slowly. Up one dune and down 
another. The cold wing searing against your body. You trudge along.

rooms.Name: Before a Small Hut
rooms.Description:
You currently stand before a small hut. Barely taller then your head.
It appears to be made of some sort of grass. You look around the hut.
The only entrance is a small door in the front.

rooms.Name: Down the Hallway
rooms.Description:
You continue walking down the hallway. To your east is what looks like
a small dolphin tank. To the west you can see the swirling sands of some
odd planet. Through the small door you can feel the cold winds.

rooms.Name: Inside a Small Hut
rooms.Description:
You have entered into a small house. A quaint house filled with odd items
and odd sights. Several odd paintings line the walls. Odd furniture
sits on the floor. Being tacky and not doing much else. You notice
that noone seems to be home. The walls have been painted a very light
shade of green. Its very ugly. But it matches everything else.
The rest of the house, all of it, is very ugly.

rooms.Name: Lost in the Swirling Sands of a Odd Planet
rooms.Description:
You walk along through the sand. Dragging your feet against it. The sand
below your toes tugging at your feet. You should seek shelter soon or
seal your doom. Lost amongst the sands of the shifting winds.

rooms.Name: Lost in the Swirling Sands of a Odd Planet
rooms.Description:
You have found yourself into..well nothing. All around you are what look
like bones of some sorts of animals. Sand runs in every direction.

rooms.Name: Above a Large Hole
rooms.Description:
You have reached a small cliff. It overlooks a small hole in the middle
of a wide open expanse of land and sand. In the middle of it is what
looks like a corpse. A large whale corpse that appears to have been 
splattered across the rocks lies below. Down the slope a bit.

rooms.Name: Inside a Large Hole
rooms.Description:
You slowly climb down the rocks and hop over a large boulder. You have 
to watch your footing as you make your way across the rocks. In the
center of the hole is a large corpse. Blood splattered in various places.
To the east is a small hole wedged in the stone.

rooms.Name: A Small Hallway
rooms.Description:
You have come across a small hallway in the interior of the Vogon Ship.
Its a small hallway that runs north and south. You can continue walking
north or go back south.

rooms.Name: A Street Corner
rooms.Description:
THAT REALLY HURT!

You took quite a spill falling throught that portal.  Where are you it appears
to be a normal street corner but wait what is that... it can't be... it's the
triple-breasted whore.

rooms.Name: The Killers Temple
rooms.Description:
This large room exists without regard to its environment.  This temple is
dedicated to the clan of Killers.  It's founders statues are standing at the 
front of the temple and a slate shows the Killers clan.
